layout.name: canBlockLeft
layout.title: Can Block from Left
layout.tooltip: If ticked, it can block the camera if it appears from its left side.

layout.name: canBlockRight
layout.title: Can Block from Right
layout.tooltip: If ticked, it can block the camera if it appears from its right side.

layout.name: canBlockTop
layout.title: Can Block from Top
layout.tooltip: If ticked, it can block the camera if it appears from its top side.

layout.name: canBlockBottom
layout.title: Can Block from Bottom
layout.tooltip: If ticked, it can block the camera if it appears from its bottom side.
